name: Clong
description:
Controls : Left paddle: W and S. Right paddle: Up arrow and Down arrow to move up and down the paddles.

I had this private for a while and tought to make it public because why not.

This is a pong clone but with a multiplayer mode in it. Keep in mind that the multiplayer is broken right now, and only the single player and the local 2 player modes work at the moment. 

I mainly created this game just to test my current knowledge and see if I can make a simple game from finish to start. And I also wanted to learn about networking, but I still have a lot to learn since the multiplayer has problems  syncing the paddles movement. I might try some day to make another simple game like this, who knows. :)
